title: INT_TO_BCD (Function)
text:
FUNCTION INT_TO_BCD : BYTE
Converts an INT value into a byte in BCD code
Example in ST:
i
:=
INT_TO_BCD
(
49
);
(* Result is 73 *)
k
:=
BCD_TO_INT
(
97
);
(* Result is 151 *)
l
:=
BCD_TO_INT
(
100
);
(* Error! Output: 255 *)

rows.Name: INT_TO_BCD
rows.Comment: Value in BCD code for the inputI

rows.Name: I
rows.Comment: Value as INT. A wrong value (<0 or >99) causes a return of 255.
